posts.post_title: 1887 N172 Old Judge George Pinkney (Bat Nearly Vert) - PSA 6 (MK)

Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. Any questions, please let me know.
